p: The TBAR values in the negative control and S5 (SNE + OEO) sample were 1.19 and 1.22 MDA/kg, respectively, which were significantly lower than the other treatments ( p < 0.05) after storage at 4 Â°C. The lipid oxidation in the positive control sample showed the highest value of TBARS (1.72 MDA/Kg) with significant differences with the other samples. The S1 samples (SNE + CLEO) and S4 (OEO) presented similar values (1.35 and 1.32 MDA/kg); they were significantly different from S2 samples (Cl, 1.45 MDA/kg). S3 (SNE, 1.28 MDA/kg) was different from S2 but not from S4 (OEO, 1.32 MDA/kg).
